OpportunityCompetitor.name: OpportunityCompetitor
OpportunityCompetitor.description: Represents a competitor on an Opportunity.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin (true) or not (false). Label is Deleted.

OpportunityId.description: Required. ID of the associated Opportunity.

Strengths.description: Description of the competitor’s strengths. Limit: 1,000 characters.

Weaknesses.description: Description of the competitor’s weaknesses. Limit: 1,000 characters.
